ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He will burn in a Flaming Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: He will be roasted in the fire,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Surely, he will be cast into a Flaming Fire
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: His property and worldly gains will be of no help to him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He will soon enter the flaming fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: He will enter a Fire full of flames!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He shall soon burn in fire that flames,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: he shall roast at a flaming fire
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He will be plunged in flaming Fire,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: He shall soon enter a Blazing Fire,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Anon he shall roast into Fire having flame.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Soon he will enter the blazing fire,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Burnt soon will he be in a Fire of Blazing Flame!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: He will be burnt in a Fire of blazing flames!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: he shall roast at a Flaming Fire,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He will burn in a Flaming Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: He will [enter to] burn in a Fire of [blazing] flame
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [111:3] He will [soon] enter a Fire of flames, that is to say, [a fire that is] flaming and ignited (this [statement] is the source of his nickname, [which was given to him] on account of his flaming reddish fair face),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He will be plunged) in the Hereafter (in flaming fire) which will kindle and rage with flames,
